media:group.media:title: Believe In Reason, Not Math
media:group.media:description:
Visit http://brilliant.org/BriTheMathGuy/ to get started learning STEM for free, and the first 200 people will get 20% off their annual premium subscription.

This problem is know as a Saint Petersburg Paradox. Even though math tells us the "right" decision to make, no one would ever make it?

So how much will you pay to play my game?

Corrections:
0:06 Sorry for using 5 dollar bills, the premise is the same
0:46 Win 4 dollars is probability 1/8
0:51 Win 8 dollars is probability 1/16
1:52 Missing adding by 8 x 1/16 (then the pattern continues)

#math #brithemathguy #Probability
